ej,ellij101,P,chyln901,Fighting ej,colub101,P,chyln901,Fighting $Bob Coluccio and John Ellis collided at HP; Ellis tagged Coluccio hard on the face and a fight started; Don Money jumped in first and started fighting with Ellis; both benches cleared; Coluccio and Ellis ejected by HP umpire Nestor Chylak; once the field was cleared, a pitch from Ray Lamb sailed near the head of Pedro Garcia, who started for the mound; both benches cleared again but Garcia was restrained
